    • shouldExecute

      public final boolean shouldExecute()
      Description copied from interface: QueryOptimizer
      Hook for each implementation to have a chance to decide whether to execute. Typically, each QueryOptimizer would check whether it is applicable for the current database.
      Specified by:
      shouldExecute in interface QueryOptimizer
      Returns:
      true if this optimizer should execute

    • comment

      public String comment()
      Description copied from interface: QueryOptimizer
      Provide a comment string of this query optimizer to be inserted into the header of the SQL string. Ex. "/* SET LOCAL enable_hashjoin = off */" could be inserted into the SQL for a disable hash join optimizer
